# NENetworkRule.Protocol.UDP

**Case**

A rule protocol to match UDP traffic.

## Declaration

```swift
case UDP
```

## Protocols

- **NENetworkRule.Protocol.TCP**: A rule protocol to match TCP traffic.
- **NENetworkRule.Protocol.any**: A rule protocol to match TCP and UDP traffic.
